data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Hamah who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hamah, Syria

data.prayer: There are 1,628,000 people living in the state of Hamah. Only about 3,102 might be believers.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Hamah, Syria.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Hamah, Syria to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 3,102 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Turkmen, Middle-Eastern people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Turkmen, Middle-Eastern people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Turkmen, Middle-Eastern people is yours.
Spirit, sanctify the 3,102 believers in Hamah and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Hamah, Syria to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Hamah. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

location.name: Hamah
location.cities_list: Ḩamāh, As Salamīyah, Maşyāf, Şūrān, Ţayyibat al Imām
location.cities_list_w_pop: Ḩamāh (460,602), As Salamīyah (94,887), Maşyāf (32,262), Şūrān (30,716), Ţayyibat al Imām (29,259)
